price: Hakika watu wa Peponi leo wamo shughulini, wamefurahi.
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ
footnotes: Hakika watu wa Peponi hii leo watakuwa wameshughulika kwa neema walizo nazo, wakistaajabia na kufurahia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
